info.title: App Portfolio REST API
info.description: REST API using ISO20022, all #/components/parameters/server* parameters provided by server

requestBody.description: Encrypted data from FFB, BFF decrypts in server and forwards to REST API

parameters.description: APP EXTERNAL can only run a module that belongs to the app id
APP EXTERNAL can only run a module that belongs to the app id

count.description: Return limit query parameter or number of records

total_count.description: Total rows of number if records>0 else 0

count.description: Least of limit query parameter and number of records

code.description: module group APP, IAM, BFF, SERVER, SOCKET, DB, MICROSERVICE or name of server function

text.description: Full error message for admin app or SERVER ERROR is returned if status 500, server log contains full info

AuthorizationBearer.description: Syntax: Bearer [app access, app_access_verification or admin token using base64]

app-id.description: Should be in all requests to identify app

app-signature.description: Should be in all requests to authenticate app. Contains encrypted message that should be decryptable using private key for given AppId

app-id-token.description: Created when app starts. Should be in all requests to protect all paths except for external and microservice requests. Syntax Bearer [app id token using base64]

resource_id_number.description: Used here to identify the resource number, if used then response is single resource format or else resource list format using ISO20022 format
resource_id_number.name: resource_id_number

resource_id_string.description: Used here to identify the resource string, if used then response is single resource format or else resource list format using ISO20222 format
resource_id_string.name: resource_id_string

locale.description: Used here for regional result that overrides accept_language, contains string either ISO 639-1, ISO 639-1 + '_' + ISO 3166-1 or ISO 639-1 + '_' + ISO 15924 + '_' + ISO 3166-1 using BCP 47 format. Scripts arab, cyrl, guru, hans, hant and latn part of ISO15924 are supported. All characters that Noto Sans font offers are supported and configured. Browsers can have some limited support with known issues of hanidec numbers and hijri transliteration of arabic on some mobile devices or apps. Parameter is required since server will set value if not used in request. FFB in the app sends locale for all GET requests
locale.name: locale

IAM_iam_user_id.description: iam_user.id to be authenticated in IAM can be in query or in body, admin does not use IAM authentication
IAM_iam_user_id.name: iam_user_id

IAM_iam_user_app_id.description: iam_user_app.id to be authenticated in IAM can be in path or in body, admin does not use IAM authentication
IAM_iam_user_app_id.name: iam_user_app_id

IAM_module_app_id.description: App id for an App Module to be authenticated in IAM that user has access to, can be in query or in body, admin does not use IAM authentication
IAM_module_app_id.name: module_app_id

IAM_data_app_id.description: App id for data to be authenticated in IAM that user has access to, can be in query or in body, admin does not use IAM authentication
IAM_data_app_id.name: data_app_id

server_app_id.description: Used here to authenticate app id
server_app_id.name: app_id

server_authorization.description: Used here to send as parameter to a function on the server for security reasons
server_authorization.name: authorization

server_ip.description: Used here for regional result or security reasons
server_ip.name: ip

server_idtoken.description: Used here to send as parameter to a function on the server and update socket connection or send SSE
server_idtoken.name: iam

server_user_agent.description: Used in a function for responsive result, statistic or security reasons
server_user_agent.name: user_agent

server_accept_language.description: Used in a function for regional result, statistic or security reasons
server_accept_language.name: accept_language

server_host.description: req.headers.host, used in a function for security reasons
server_host.name: host

server_endpoint.description: Used to prioritize requests for admin, authenticating app modules or for control of APP_EXTERNAL requests
server_endpoint.name: endpoint

server_message_queue_type.description: Used to identify message queue type PUBLISH or CONSUME. Message queue type ERROR is created in server if CONSUME fails
server_message_queue_type.name: message_queue_type

server_method.description: Used to send method to microservice from server
server_method.name: method

server_response.description: Use this parameter to send response as parameter if response is text/event-stream
server_response.name: server_response

301.description: Redirect if user account or path not found
